div.span: (It is assumed that the current accumulated fees of the protocol at the start of the action are all equal to zero; if they are not zero, then they must be subtracted from the current balances before calculations)

div.style: border-color: var(--border-color);

span.style: background-color: initial; font-family: "Courier New"; border-color: var(--border-color);

li.span: utput assets amounts according to the protocol's logic:
Solve f(D; x - x_u, y - y_u, z - z_u) = 0 numerically to receive new native invariant value D1;

li.font: Apply fees to imbalanced balances deltas (comparing real output balances with ideal ones, proportional to the D1/D0 ratio, where D0 = Pool.pool_data.inv) to receive protocol fees (x_u_p_fee, y_u_p_fee, z_u_p_fee) and liquidity provider fees (x_u_lp_fee, y_u_lp_fee, z_u_lp_fee);
Solve f(D; x - x_req - x_u_lp_fee - x_u_p_fee, ...) = 0 numerically to receive invariant value D1';
Calculate the required lp_req amount of LP tokens as (D0 - D1')*(EMISSION_LP - Pool.LP.value)/D0.
Solve f(D; x - x_u - x_u_p_fee, ...) = 0 numerically to receive new invariant value D2;

li.span: Put the calculated values ​​of the assets
into the corresponding outputs, values of the invariants D1, D1' into the action context and new invariant value D2 with updated protocol fees (x_u_p_fee, y_u_p_fee, z_u_p_fee) into the pool's data.

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
